settings.label: XT (crystal oscillator) above 100 kHz, below 8 MHz
EC (external clock) for 500 kHz to 8 MHz
HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 64 MHz and CDIV = 1:1
EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 4 MHz and CDIV = 4:1
EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits (device manufacturing default)
PRLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once
PRLOCKED bit can be set and cleared repeatedly
The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is MCLR
If LVP = 0, MCLR pin function is port defined function
Multi-vector enabled, Vector table used for interrupts
Interrupt contoller does not use vector table to prioritze interrupts

fields.label: IVTLOCK bit One-way set enable bit

settings.label: IVTLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once
IVTLOCKED bit can be cleared and set repeatedly
Brown-out Reset enabled , SBOREN bit is ignored
Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep
Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN
ZCD module is disabled. ZCD can be enabled by setting the ZCDSEN bit of ZCDCON

fields.label: PPSLOCK bit One-Way Set Enable bit

settings.label: PPSLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once
PPSLOCKED bit can be set and cleared repeatedly (subject to the unlock sequence)
Stack full/underflow will not cause Reset
Low voltage programming enabled. MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR. MCLRE configuration bit is ignored
HV on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming
Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode disabled
Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode enabled
WDT enabled while sleep=0, suspended when sleep=1
WDT enabled regardless of sleep: SWDTEN is ignored
window delay = 75 percent of time: no software control
window delay = 62.5 percent of time: no software control
window delay = 50 percent of time: no software control
window delay = 37.5 percent of time: no software control
window delay = 25 percent of time: no software control
window always open (100%): no software control
WDT reference clock is the 31.0 kHz LFINTOSC
WDT reference clock is the 32kHz MFINTOSC output

fields.label: PFM and Data EEPROM Code Protection bit

settings.label: PFM and Data EEPROM code protection disabled
PFM and Data EEPROM code protection enabled
